Function reference

All functions

connectToOBS()
Create the R OBS Websocket object
CreateInput()
Create an input
createOBSWebsocket()
Create the R OBS Websocket object
CreateScene()
Create a new scene
CreateSceneCollection()
Create a new scene collection
CreateSourceFilter()
Creates a new filter for a source
disconnectFromOBS()
Create the R OBS Websocket object
GetCurrentPreviewScene()
Asks for the name of the current preview scene
GetCurrentProgramScene()
Asks for the name of the current program scene
GetGroupList()
Gets the list of all groups
GetHotkeyList()
Gets the hot key list
GetInputAudioBalance()
Gets the audio balance of an input
GetInputAudioMonitorType()
Gets the audio monitor type of an input
GetInputAudioSyncOffset()
Gets the audio sync offset of an input
GetInputAudioTracks()
Gets the enable state of all audio tracks of an input
GetInputDefaultSettings()
Gets the default settings for an input kind
GetInputKindList()
ask for a list of the input kinds
GetInputList()
ask for a list of the inputs
GetInputMute()
Get the mute state of an input
GetInputPropertiesListPropertyItems()
Gets the items of a list property for an input
GetInputSettings()
Gets the settings of an input
GetInputVolume()
Gets the volume of an input
GetMonitorList()
Ask for the monitor List
GetProfileList()
Gets the profil list
GetRecordDirectory()
Gets the record directory
GetRecordStatus()
Gets the record of the stream output
GetSceneCollectionList()
Get the list of all the scene collections
GetSceneItemList()
ask for a list of the items
GetSceneList()
ask for a list of the scenes
GetSceneSceneTransitionOverride()
Gets the scene "transition override" for a scene.
GetSourceFilterDefaultSettings()
Gets the default settings for a filter kind
GetSourceFilterList()
Get all the filters of a source
GetSpecialInputs()
Ask for a list of the special inputs
GetStats()
Gets statistics about OBS, obs-websocket, and the current session
GetStreamServiceSettings()
Gets the stream service settings
GetStreamStatus()
Gets the status of the stream output
GetStudioModeEnabled()
Asks whether studio mode is enabled.
GetVersion()
Gets the version of the currentplugin and rpc version
GetVideoSettings()
Gets the video settings
identifyToOBS()
Create the R OBS Websocket object
OBSWebSocket
R OBS Websocket Class
OpenInputFiltersDialog()
Open the input filters properties dialog box
OpenInputInteractDialog()
Open the input interact Dialog box
OpenInputPropertiesDialog()
Open the input properties dialog box
parseById()
Use the ID of a request response to parse the response data
PauseRecord()
Pause the record of the stream output
PressInputPropertiesButton()
Press a button in the properties of an input
RemoveInput()
Remove an input
RemoveScene()
Remove a Scene from OBS
RemoveSourceFilter()
Removes a filter for a source
ResumeRecord()
Resume the record of the stream output
SendStreamCaption()
Sends CEA-608 caption text over the stream output
SetCurrentPreviewScene()
Changes the Scene of the current preview
SetCurrentProgramScene()
Changes the Scene of the current program
SetCurrentSceneCollection()
Switch the current scene collection
SetInputAudioBalance()
Set the audio balance of an input
SetInputAudioMonitorType()
Change the audio monitor type of an input
SetInputAudioSyncOffset()
Set the audio balance of an input
SetInputAudioTracks()
Sets the settings of audio tracks for an input
SetInputMute()
Mute or unmute an input
SetInputName()
Change the name of an input
SetInputSettings()
Sets the settings of an input
SetInputVolume()
Set the volume of an input
SetSceneName()
Sets the name of a scene (rename).
SetSceneSceneTransitionOverride()
Sets the scene "transition override" for a scene.
SetStudioModeEnabled()
Activate or desactivate the studio mode
StartRecord()
Start the record of the stream output
StartStream()
Start the stream output
StopRecord()
Stop the record of the stream output
StopStream()
Stop the stream output
ToggleInputMute()
Mute or Unmute an input
ToggleRecord()
Toggle the record of the stream output
ToggleRecordPause()
Toggles pause on the record of the stream output
ToggleStream()
Toggle the status of the stream output
ViewLog()
View the log of requests and the responses
